targets.legendFormat: bdb1 top redis:{{redis}}, bdb:{{bdb}},  role:{{role}}, Slots: {{slots}}
bdb2 top redis:{{redis}}, bdb:{{bdb}},  role:{{role}}, Slots: {{slots}}

targets.expr: (bdb_read_hits{bdb="$bdb1", cluster="$cluster1"} + bdb_write_hits{bdb="$bdb1", cluster="$cluster1"}) / (bdb_read_req{bdb="$bdb1", cluster="$cluster1"} + bdb_write_req{bdb="$bdb1", cluster="$cluster1"}) > 0

(bdb_read_hits{bdb="$bdb2", cluster="$cluster2"} + bdb_write_hits{bdb="$bdb2", cluster="$cluster2"}) / (bdb_read_req{bdb="$bdb2", cluster="$cluster2"} + bdb_write_req{bdb="$bdb2", cluster="$cluster2"}) > 0

panels.title: redis_crdt_peer_peer_state != 1.  [ initialized: 0, online: 1, wait_fullsync: 2, fullsync: 3, fullsync_ack: 4, closed: 5 ]

targets.expr: (bdb_big_fetch_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_write_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_del_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"}) / (bdb_big_fetch_flash{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_write_flash{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_del_flash{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_fetch_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_write_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_del_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"}) > 0

panels.description: Positive is RAM, Negative is Flash
panels.title: RAM:Flash access ratio

panels.description: Positive is RAM, Negative is Flash
panels.title: BDB RAM:Flash access ratio
BDB sum redis wait busy key / $aggregation
BDB sum redis active defrag running
BDB sum redis big inst avg read io queue
BDB sum redis big inst avg write io queue
